entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming clear overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
